pr_title: HDDS-4588. If volume's quota is enabled then bucket's quota cannot be cleared

timeline.bodyText: Nit: will it better to use more descriptive names than variable names. For example, replace quotaInBytes by space quota?
timeline.author: amaliujia

timeline.bodyText: Nit: same, maybe replace quotaInNamespace by namespace quota?
timeline.author: amaliujia

replies.bodyText:
Agreed with @amaliujia 's suggestion. I also prefer to do below rename changing for more readable:
quotaInNamespace -> namespaceQuota
quotaInNamespace -> spaceQuota
replies.author: linyiqun

timeline.bodyText:
Can try something like this -
  LambdaTestUtils.intercept(IOException.class, "Before clear bucket "
            + "quotaInBytes, volume quotaInBytes need to be clear first.",
        () -> ozoneBucket.clearSpaceQuota());

Shall save lines and looks better
timeline.author: ayushtkn

timeline.bodyText:
Similarly here -
    LambdaTestUtils.intercept(IOException.class, "Before clear bucket "
            + "quotaInNamespace, volume quotaInNamespace need to be clear first.",
        () -> ozoneBucket.clearCountQuota());
timeline.author: ayushtkn
